question:
Consider the following bodies:
1. Coffee Board of India
2. Tea Board, India
3. Rubber Board of India
4. Coconut Development Board
Which among the above are statutory bodies?
explanation: The present Tea Board set up under section 4 of the Tea Act 1953 was constituted on 1st April 1954. Coffee Board was established through Coffee Act VII of 1942. Rubber Board  was established under the Rubber Act 1947. Coconut Development Board was established under Coconut Development Board Act 1979.
